derivation: (Aramaic) from H2939 (טְעַם), and equivalent to H2941 (טַעַם);
outline:
1. decree, taste, judgment, command
    1. taste
    2. judgment, discretion
    3. report
    4. command
kjv_def: [phrase] chancellor, [phrase] command, commandment, decree, [phrase] regard, taste, wisdom.
strongs_def: properly, flavor; figuratively, judgment (both subjective and objective); hence, account (both subjectively and objectively)
